AsyncTrigger.mode

Function/Meaning
Mode
Type
Property of AsyncTrigger class (Read/Write)
Description
Represents the operation mode. The value can also be set.
Specify one of the following values:
atmNormal : Fired during the normal event delivery stage.
atmExclusive : Fired with priority over other asynchronous events.
atmAtIdle : Fired when in an idle state (when there are no other events to deliver).
When multiple triggers are pulled simultaneously, the firing order is atmExclusive, atmNormal, then atmAtIdle.
If multiple triggers of the same mode are pulled, they are fired in the order they were pulled.
Reference
Timer.mode
